info.name: OSINT and Cyberintelligence
info.main: Test your knowledge of open-source intelligence (OSINT) and how to assess digital exposure using passive reconnaissance techniques.
info.results: Congratulations! You have demonstrated a solid understanding of OSINT techniques and cyberintelligence principles.

questions.q: What does performing OSINT on a domain like example.com involve?

a.option: Collecting public and legally accessible information about its digital assets without actively interacting with its systems
Conducting port scans and intrusion testing on the domain
Sending phishing emails to accounts under the domain to detect vulnerabilities
Auditing its internal systems via remote access

questions.q: Which tool allows you to visualize relationships between people, emails, domains, and IPs?

a.option: Maltego
Shodan
theHarvester
Spiderfoot

questions.q: What kind of search does Google Dorks allow?

a.option: Advanced search using operators to find sensitive indexed information
Access to internal company databases
Vulnerability scanning of websites
Detection of hidden malware on web pages

questions.q: What is a common mistake in OSINT investigations?

a.option: Searching without a clear objective
Using multiple sources to verify data
Working from an anonymous environment
Focusing on verified and recent data

questions.q: What is the purpose of using Shodan in OSINT?

a.option: Identify publicly accessible devices and services associated with a domain or IP
Create fake IP addresses for testing
Simulate denial of service attacks
Send phishing notifications to users

questions.q: What can Have I Been Pwned detect?

a.option: Credential leaks associated with specific email addresses
Available hosting services for a domain
Unindexed internal emails
Installed software versions on a server

questions.q: What is considered a good practice when collecting OSINT?

a.option: Cross-check the obtained information with multiple sources for authenticity
Only analyze the first page of Google results
Request access to private databases
Rely on unverified forum posts

questions.q: Why is identifying subdomains like mail.example.com or login.example.com important?

a.option: To detect potentially exposed services or attack vectors within an organization's infrastructure
To send automated requests to those subdomains
To generate active phishing campaigns
To simulate network traffic inside their servers
